C

Command - Interface in fr.istic.aco.editor.Interface
The Command interface defines the structure for all commands in the editor.
CommandOriginator - Interface in fr.istic.aco.editor.Interface
The CommandOriginator interface combines the functionalities of the Command and Originator interfaces.
CopyCommand - Class in fr.istic.aco.editor.CommandOriginator
The CopyCommand class implements the CommandOriginator interface and is responsible for copying the currently selected text in the engine.

Constructs a CopyCommand with the specified engine, selection, and recorder.

E

Editor - Class in fr.istic.aco.editor.UI
The Editor class initializes the components of the text editor, such as the Engine, Selection, Recorder, and Invoker, and starts the textual interface for interacting with the editor.

Engine - Interface in fr.istic.aco.editor.Interface
Main API for the text editing engine
EngineImpl - Class in fr.istic.aco.editor.ClassImpl
Implementation of the Engine interface that provides text editing functionalities such as inserting, cutting, copying, pasting, and deleting text within a buffer.
EngineImpl() - Constructor for class fr.istic.aco.editor.ClassImpl.EngineImpl
Constructs an EngineImpl object with an empty buffer, empty clipboard, and a new selection.
execute() - Method in class fr.istic.aco.editor.CommandOriginator.CopyCommand
Executes the copy operation by invoking the engine's copySelectedText method and saves the command state using the recorder.
execute() - Method in class fr.istic.aco.editor.CommandOriginator.CutCommand
Executes the cut operation by invoking the engine's cutSelectedText method and saves the command state using the recorder.
execute() - Method in class fr.istic.aco.editor.CommandOriginator.DeleteCommand
Executes the delete operation by invoking the engine's delete method and saves the command state using the recorder.
execute() - Method in class fr.istic.aco.editor.CommandOriginator.InsertCommand
Executes the insert operation by invoking the engine's insert method with the text to insert from the invoker.
execute() - Method in class fr.istic.aco.editor.CommandOriginator.PasteCommand
Executes the paste operation by pasting the content from the clipboard into the engine at the current selection position.
execute() - Method in class fr.istic.aco.editor.CommandOriginator.SelectionCommand
Executes the selection operation by setting the begin and end indices of the selection using the values provided by the invoker.
execute() - Method in class fr.istic.aco.editor.ConcreteCommandd.ReplayCommand
Executes the replay command, causing the recorder to replay the recorded actions.

This interface defines the Recorder in the Command pattern with Memento.
